source.name: integrating the ChatGPT API
source.instructions: Which of the following is **NOT** a potential benefit of integrating the ChatGPT API with your development tools?

answers.answer: Accessing AI-powered assistance directly within your preferred environment
Increasing the difficulty of communication within development teams.
Automating code reviews and generating test cases.

source.guidance: The passage specifically mentions that integrating the ChatGPT API can "facilitate communication and collaboration within development teams," not increase its difficulty.
